docs.lead_paragraph: Johnson & Johnson says its pharmaceutical business expects to seek regulatory approval by 2019 for more than 10 new products, each with the potential to top $1 billion in annual sales.

headline.main: Johnson & Johnson Expects Lucrative Return on Drug Pipeline
headline.print_headline: Johnson & Johnson Expects Lucrative Return on Drug Pipeline

docs.snippet: Johnson & Johnson says its pharmaceutical business expects to seek regulatory approval by 2019 for more than 10 new products, each with the potential to top $1 billion in annual sales.

docs.lead_paragraph: The liquid is dark red, a mixture of fat and blood, and Dr. Mark Berman pumps it out of the patient's backside. He treats it with a chemical, runs it through a processor — and injects it into the woman's aching knees and elbows.

headline.main: Stem Cell 'Wild West' Takes Root Amid Lack of US Regulation
headline.print_headline: Stem Cell 'Wild West' Takes Root Amid Lack of US Regulation

docs.snippet: The liquid is dark red, a mixture of fat and blood, and Dr. Mark Berman pumps it out of the patient's backside. He treats it with a chemical, runs it through a processor — and injects it into the woman's aching knees and elbows.

docs.lead_paragraph: By offering a new DNA standard for tests used in the diagnosis and treatment of disease, the federal government is opening a new era in genetic medicine.

headline.main: U.S. Introduces New DNA Standard for Ensuring Accuracy of Genetic Tests
headline.print_headline: U.S. Introduces New DNA Standard for Ensuring Accuracy of Genetic Tests

docs.abstract: National Institute of Standards and Technology announces new reference standards that could be used to ensure accuracy of DNA testing; marks important step towards new era in the use of genetic medicine.
docs.snippet: By offering a new DNA standard for tests used in the diagnosis and treatment of disease, the federal government is opening a new era in genetic medicine.

keywords.value: National Institute of Standards and Technology
